response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique qualities and benefits. Considering its significance to both parties, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $1,100,000. This is a generous offer that allows you to secure this valuable asset while also benefiting financially. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 1100000}
